articles.title: Box Office: ‘Tron: Ares’ Stumbles With $33.5 Million Debut - Variety
articles.description: Disney's sci-fi sequel "Tron: Ares" topped the box office in its debut.
articles.content:
Disney’s sci-fi sequel “Tron: Ares” failed to connect in its box office debut, collecting a disappointing $33.5 million from 4,000 North American theaters over the weekend.
